name: Mushroots
description:
Story
The forest has been corrupted and the roots seem to be filled with destructive madness. Our heroine, Aminata, must brave the dangers and avoid the demonic roots to retrieve the ingredients needed to create the cure. But the closer Aminata gets to victory, the more fearsome nature becomes.

Team
Marcie CETOU - 3D artist
Mari-Annaig DUPAYA - Dev
Dylan DROMARD  - Dev
William GAUTHIER - GD / UX / UI Design
Alex HOUNGBO - Composer /  Sound Design
Chloé RAPHEL - PM & Narrative Design
